p: Isolation of CSF enterovirus in cell culture is 75% less sensitive than NAATs. Therefore, NAATs are the most reliable method for the diagnosis of enterovirus infection in CSF [ 119]. 5_ UTR pan- enteroviral primers used in these approaches can detect a broad spectrum of enteroviruses, containing the nonculturable coxsackievirus strains. However, for the detection of parechoviruses, other probes are required [ 121].
